question: a train 110 m long is running with a speed of 30 km / hr . in what time will it pass a man who is running at 6 km / hr in the direction opposite to that in which the train is going ?

an old man distributed all the gold coins he had to his two sons into two different numbers such that the difference between the squares of the two numbers is 16 times the difference between the two numbers . how many coins did the old man have ?
10 friends went to a hotel and decided to pay the bill amount equally . but 9 of them could pay rs . 50 each as a result 10 th has to pay rs . 180 extra than his share . find the amount paid by him .
65 % of x = 20 % of 422.50 . find the value of x ?

at a loading dock , each worker on the night crew loaded 1 / 2 as many boxes as each worker on the day crew . if the night crew has 4 / 5 as many workers as the day crew , what fraction of all the boxes loaded by the two crews did the day crew load ?

in a company of 11 employees , 5 employees earn $ 32,000 , 4 employees earn $ 45,000 , and the 2 highest - paid employees earn the same amount . if the average annual salary for the 11 employees is $ 48,000 , what is the annual salary for each of the highest - paid employees ?
a boy goes to his school from his house at a speed of 3 km / hr and returns at a speed of 2 km / hr . if he takes 5 hours in going and coming . the distance between his house and school is ?
a student was asked to find 4 / 5 of a number . but the student divided the number by 4 / 5 , thus the student got 36 more than the correct answer . find the number .
john can row at 5 kmph and still water . he takes 5 hours to row from a to b and back . what is the distance between a and b if the speed of the stream is 1 kmph ?

two trains 121 meters and 153 meters in length respectively are running in opposite directions , one at the rate of 80 km and the other at the rate of 65 kmph . in what time will they be completely clear of each other from the moment they meet ?
in a division sum , the remainder is 6 and the divisor is 5 times the quotient and is obtained by adding 27 to the thrice of the remainder . the dividend is
what is the smallest number which when increased by 3 is divisible by 18 , 70 , 100 and 21 ?

a truck covers a distance of 240 km at a certain speed in 8 hours . how much time would a car take at an average speed which is 18 kmph more than that of the speed of the truck to cover a distance which is 0 km more than that travelled by the truck ?

dick and jane each saved $ 1,000 in 1989 . in 1990 dick saved 15 percent more than in 1989 , and together he and jane saved a total of $ 2,000 . approximately what percent less did jane save in 1990 than in 1989 ?
the population of a town is 7500 . it decreases annually at the rate of 10 % p . a . what was its population 2 years ago ?
find the number , difference between number and its 3 / 5 is 56 .

a train leaves delhi at 11 a . m . at a speed of 30 kmph . another train leaves at 2 p . m . at a speed of 40 kmph on the same day and in the same direction . how far from delhi , will the two trains meet ?

fonzie , aunt bee and lapis paid $ 7000 , $ 8000 and $ 9000 respectively to buy a map to capt . plaidstache ' s treasure . when they found it , the treasure turned out to be worth a cool $ 900000 . how much of it should lapis get ?

in a stockpile of products produced by 3 machines m 1 , m 2 and m 3 , 40 % and 30 % were manufactured by m 1 and m 2 respectively . 3 % of the products of m 1 are defective , 1 % of products of m 2 defective , while 93 % of the products of m 3 iii are not defective . what is the percentage of defective in the stockpile ?
if 50 % of ( x - y ) = 20 % of ( x + y ) then what percent of x is y ?
if k ^ 3 is divisible by 180 , what is the least possible value of integer k ?
ravi can do a piece of work in 50 days while prakash can do it in 75 days . in how many days will they finish it together ?
how much water should be added to 15 liters of a 20 % - solution of alcohol to reduce the concentration of alcohol in the solution by 75 % ?
given a + b = 1 , find the value of 2 a + 2 b . two solutions are presented below . only one is correct , even though both yield the correct answer .

a and b began business with rs . 3000 and rs . 4000 after 8 months , a withdraws rs . 1000 and b advances rs . 1000 more . at the end of the year , their profits amounted to rs . 630 find the share of a .
the speed of a boat in still water is 8 kmph . if it can travel 1 km upstream in 1 hr , what time it would take to travel the same distance downstream ?

a car going at 40 miles per hour set out on an 90 - mile trip at 9 : 00 a . m . exactly 10 minutes later , a second car left from the same place and followed the same route . how fast , in miles per hour , was the second car going if it caught up with the first car at 10 : 30 a . m . ?

a grocer has 400 pounds of coffee in stock , 20 percent of which is decaffeinated . if the grocer buys another 100 pounds of coffee of which 50 percent is decaffeinated , what percent , by weight , of the grocer ’ s stock of coffee is decaffeinated ?
patrick purchased 60 pencils and sold them at a loss equal to the selling price of 20 pencils . the cost of 60 pencils is how many times the selling price of 60 pencils ?
if x is equal to the sum of the integers from 60 to 80 , inclusive , and y is the number of even integers from 60 to 80 , inclusive , what is the value of x + y ?

set q consists of integers { 3 , - 8 , y , 19 , - 6 } and set b consists of integers { k , - 3 , 0 , 16 , - 5 , 9 } . number l represents the median of set q , number m represents mode of set b and number z = l ^ m . if y is an integer greater than 21 , for what value of k will z be a divisor of 26 ?

a dishonest person wants to make a profit on the selling of milk . he would like to mix water ( costing nothing ) with milk costing 33 $ per litre so as to make a profit of 40 % on cost when he sells the resulting milk and water mixture for 36 $ . in what ratio should he mix the water and milk ?
two dice are thrown simultaneously . what is the probability of getting two numbers whose product is even ?
if y > 0 , ( 2 y ) / 20 + ( 3 y ) / 10 is what percent of y ?
a number x is multiplied by 7 , and this product is then divided by 5 . if the positive square root of the result of these two operations equals x , what is the value of x if x ≠ 0 ?
a trader sells 85 meters of cloth for rs . 8925 at the profit of rs . 25 per metre of cloth . what is the cost price of one metre of cloth ?
what is the sum of the greatest common factor and the lowest common multiple of 36 and 56 ?
a train 100 meters long completely crosses a 300 meters long bridge in 30 seconds . what is the speed of the train is ?

two different primes may be said torhymearound an integer if they are the same distance from the integer on the number line . for instance , 3 and 7 rhyme around 5 . what integer w between 1 and 20 , inclusive , has the greatest number of distinct rhyming primes around it ?

a school has received 40 % of the amount it needs for a new building by receiving a donation of $ 400 each from people already solicited . people already solicited represent 40 % of the people from whom the school will solicit donations . how much average contribution is requited from the remaining targeted people to complete the fund raising exercise ?
by selling 8 pencils for a rupee a man loses 60 % . how many for a rupee should he sell in order to gain 60 % ?
consider a square of diagonal length d . let another square be formed with d as its side . find the ratio of the area of the bigger square to that of the smaller square .
walking at 75 % of his usual speed a man takes 24 minutes more to cover a distance . what is his usual time to cover this distance ?

tim came second in math . when his mother asked him how much he had scored , he answered that he got the sum of the first 5 even numbers . his mother immediately worked out the answer . how much had he scored in math ?
if the simple interest on a sum of money for 2 years at 5 % per annum is rs . 56 , what is the compound interest on the same sum at the rate and for the same time ?

nil and ethan are brothers . they left their home at the same time and drove to the same beach . nil drove at a speed of 80 miles per hour . ethan drove at a speed of 20 miles per hour . nil arrived at the beach 0.5 hour earlier than ethan . what is the distance between their home and the beach ?

real - estate salesman z is selling a house at a 20 percent discount from its retail price . real - estate salesman x vows to match this price , and then offers an additional 20 percent discount . real - estate salesman y decides to average the prices of salesmen z and x , then offer an additional 20 percent discount . salesman y ' s final price is what fraction of salesman x ' s final price ?
a , b and c invested rs . 6300 , rs . 4200 and rs . 10500 respectively , in a partnership business . find the total share of a & b in profit of rs . 12100 after a year ?
a group of n students can be divided into equal groups of 4 with 1 student left over or equal groups of 7 with 3 students left over . what is the sum of the two smallest possible values of n ?
in a river flowing at 2 km / hr , a boat travels 40 km upstream and then returns downstream to the starting point . if its speed in still water be 6 km / hr , find the total journey time .
